name: Hamster Fever!
description:
You are running a hamsters lab in order to generate power. Be careful though! These little creatures are very fragile and sometimes malicious. They can run away or die if you do not care about them enough, but most importantly they can steal your power if they run from left to right instead of RIGHT TO LEFT!

Team:

Dariusz Malec

Marcin Cecot

Zofia Domaradzka

Sounds in credits are included in the project but not implemented in the game.
